channel.title: ReflectScape 639 | 24/7 Online | Awesome PvM
channel.description:
[url=http://reflectscape.com/]http://reflectscape.com/[/url]
[B]Some of our servers' features:[/B] - High Combat Exp Rate! Decent Skilling Exp Rate! - Dementhium based. - Running on VPS (24/7 online) - 20+ fully working bosses. - 15+ Training spots. - 100% Dicing. - All working specs. - Fully automated Donation system. - Automated vote system with rewards. - Working duel arena. - Working barrows. - All skills trainable. - Working summoning. - Shops south of home. - Teleporter at home who can take you anywhere you need. - Active community. - Much more!
[B]What are we looking for?[/B] We are currently looking for active players, who enjoy the good old 2011 RSPS. :) We might also be looking for an experienced developer soon.
[B]Download our client here:[/B] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/e79ortxgutb5p3e/Reflect%20Scape.jar?dl=1]https://www.dropbox.com/s/e79ortxgutb5p3e/Reflect%20Scape.jar?dl=1[/url]
[img]http://i57.tinypic.com/ege07q.jpg[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/wjc594.jpg[/img] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/33ma4iv.jpg[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/nq1e8z.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/65ogon.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2ptntxu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/eitjkh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/24cwjyw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2w4i5ns.png[/img]
[url=http://reflectscape.com/]http://reflectscape.com/[/url]
